audio_sermons.title: A Keen Awareness Of The Church's Loss by Roger Ellsworth
audio_sermons.description: Roger Ellsworth speaks passionately about the desperate state of the Church. His sermon covers three aspects of the Isaiah scripture: A keen awareness of loss, A keen awareness of what produced the loss, A keen awareness that God could restore what was lost. True God sent revival is actual and possible in our days if we will humble ourselves as the people of God.

audio_sermons.title: Compromising Christianity by Keith Daniel
audio_sermons.description: Keith Daniel shares with earnestness the single greatest tragedy the world faces today which is "compromising Christianity." The sermon speaks of sins that Christians commit with their ears, mouth, mind and heart. He calls the congregation to break up their fallow ground and repent from any known sin.

audio_sermons.title: Let Me Not See My Wretchedness by Carter Conlon
audio_sermons.description: Carter Conlon delivers a very powerful message on the great need for personal revival in these last days. We need to realize our great need to confess our sinfulness and the need for the righteousness of Christ. We can only be agents of revival and be filled with Christ when we fully surrender to God.

audio_sermons.title: Personal Revival by Ron Bailey
audio_sermons.description: Ron Bailey from the United Kingdom shares his heart burden for personal revival from the life of David. He carefully and gracefully goes through Psalm 51 and shows how God revives His own. How we need personal revival and to come and acknowledge when God speaks.

audio_sermons.title: Question And Answer Panel Canton
audio_sermons.description: 7 speakers from the conference are asked many questions by the audience and also by the moderator Gareth Evans. The panel included the following speakers, Denny Kenaston, Don Currin, Ralph Sutera, Richard Sipley, Dean Taylor, Ron Bailey, Don Courville.

audio_sermons.title: Revival Testimonies by Don Courville
audio_sermons.description: Don Courville shares his heart and experience with God in revival. To hear these testimonies of what God has done stirs the heart towards experiencing God in a greater way. Revival is the only solution for the Church, to have God Himself in the midst.

audio_sermons.title: Revivals In The Bible by Dean Taylor
audio_sermons.description: Dean Taylor speaks of revivals in the bible in the new testament and old testament histories. This overview is very helpful to give us some clear biblical landmarks to seek God for biblical genuine revival in our day.

audio_sermons.title: Show Me Your Glory by Gareth Evans
audio_sermons.description: Gareth Evans shares many testimonies of revival experiences in his life. And it culminates in the passionate plea to God "show me your glory." This is the hunger that all true christians yearn for ultimately. God has a place of glory and overcoming life in the spirit filled holy life.

audio_sermons.title: The Canadian Revival Story by Ralph Sutera
audio_sermons.description: Ralph Sutera shares his first hand account of the revival that occoured in the 70's in canada. He shares some wonderful revival principles he learnt throughout his years and challenges the congregation to quit playing games with God and get serious about eternity.

audio_sermons.title: The Danger Of Complacency Don Currin
audio_sermons.description: Don Currin preaches a sermon on the topic of "complacency" that really points to a modern day christianity that does not live in the live and reality of God. This is a sobering warning to the Church of Jesus Christ. This is a wake up call to Church in North America.

audio_sermons.title: The Glory Is Departed by Harold Vaughn
audio_sermons.description: Harold Vaughn speaks of great need of revival and the declension of the nation of Israel under the priesthood of Eli. There is a similarity between the story found in 1st Samuel and the current state of America spiritually. This message gives a clear call for repentance for the Church of Jesus Christ.

audio_sermons.title: The Great Need Of Revival by Denny Kenaston
audio_sermons.description: Denny Kenaston opens the revival conference with a exhortation to seek the face of God, to see what God can do! He shares the burden and reason why revival is very needful in our day. Then he preaches verse by verse through psalm 80 asking God to restore his church to God.

audio_sermons.title: Worldliness by Richard Sipley
audio_sermons.description: Richard Sipley shows how in revival worldliness in the Christian life is dealt with by God. He clearly defines a biblical new testament view of what worldliness is from the teachings of Jesus and the Apostles. He shares many testimonies of what God did in his life and during his ministry.
